extendedInfo.description: Note: make sure your Xbox is upgraded to the latest firmware!Do you have an Xbox at home? Well, with this app you can unleash the video processing power of your Xbox.Simply download this FREE app and access additional content, currently not available on the Xbox itself as you use your Android to control your Xbox over Wi-Fi.Enjoy millions of videos, images, and songs anywhere and share them with your friends. Easily search and find interesting content from many sources, including your mobile device and home network, and watch it on the Xbox or on your mobile device.With the Xbox Media Player, you can do the following:â¢ SEARCH - Easily search, find, and browse videos, photos, or music and watch on TV directly from your Android phone.â¢ DISCOVER - Discover new and featured videos every day across a number of video topic channels for you to enjoy. Browse channels using easy-to-navigate video carousels.â¢ SEND TO TV - Stream music and videos directly to your TV or mobile device. No installation needed (except this app).â¢ ACCESS MEDIA - Access your photo and social networking accounts to watch on TV.â¢ MANAGE PLAYLISTS - Create and Manage playlists of music and enjoy on your mobile or TV.SUPPORTED DEVICES- Xbox 360 (no need to put it in Media Center Extender mode)FEATURESâ¢ Video searchâ¢ Add to favoritesâ¢ View and manage historyâ¢ Watch on TVâ¢ Create and manage music playlistsâ¢ Sharingâ¢ Continuous video and music playâ¢ Upload videos and photosâ¢ Access to your DLNA Home Media ServersBROWSE:â¢ Search and find your music, photos, and videos from multiple content sources including your Android device, your home network or the Internet.â¢ Share via e-mail, Twitter, and FacebookContent includes:â¢ Video Podcastsâ¢ YouTube videosâ¢ Your Music, photos, and videos from your Android device [Android Gallery]â¢ Facebook videos and photos from you and your friendsâ¢ Flickr photosâ¢ Picasa (Web Album) photosâ¢ Local Media Servers, any DLNA or UPnP AV Media Servers in your home networkNOW PLAYING:â¢ The âNow Playingâ screen provides information about the content that you are watching on TV using the WD TV Live Media Player.â¢ Music and Video player controls (i.e. previous, pause, play, next, and volume) appear, depending on the capabilities of your setup.MYZAPPOTV:â¢ Sign out of ZappoTV.â¢ Delete your viewing history.â¢ Send application logs to ZappoTV.THINGS TO KNOWâ¢ MyZappoTV > Favorites, lets you access and manage your viewing history.â¢ MyZappoTV > History makes it super easy to watch previous viewed photos or videos.REQUIREMENTS TO GET STARTEDâ¢ Android 2.1 and later versions.â¢ ZappoTV account is required.

reviews.comment: Great app it connects fine and works smoothly  :-)

reviews.title: Very impressive!
reviews.comment: Browse Facebook and YouTube on York Xbox without an Xbox live gold account. I just wish I cojuld surf the web with this app.

reviews.title: Worked
reviews.comment: Connected from phone to Xbox just fine. But I wanted an app that would let me listen to music from my phone while playing games. With this app you just stare at a blank screen while listening to music from phones. Other than that it worked just fine
reviews.author: Kenny Rodriguez

reviews.title: I\'m in love
reviews.comment: I have been looking for an app like this. cause sometimes my android X really stupid I won\'t pick up on my xbox so now I can play all of my downloaded movies I love it..................... thank you for creating this app
reviews.author: Deavante Dozier

reviews.title: Very Good work
reviews.comment: Very good app. You can share media over WiFi using Xbox to your TV. The only downside, which for this kind of app is not too bad, is that is not a native app and you can\'t navigate through music and videos besides play/pause/next. Apart from this, excellent app
